info.name: DownTranscoder
info.summary: Automatically identify and transcode large media files to save storage space
info.description:
**DownTranscoder** helps you manage large media files by automatically identifying and transcoding them to smaller sizes.
## Features
* Set a trigger size (e.g., 10 GB) to identify large videos or images * List all media exceeding this size * Queue selected media for automatic transcoding at scheduled times * Review transcoded files before deleting originals * Optional automatic deletion with warnings
## Supported Media
* Video files (MP4, MKV, AVI, etc.) * Image files (JPG, PNG, etc.)
⚠️ **Warning**: Automatic deletion is risky — always double-check before enabling it.
